INIT 500 500

#Draw some dots
POINT 125 125 (255, 255, 255, 255)
POINT 375 125 (255, 0, 0, 255)
POINT 125 375 (0, 255, 0, 255)
POINT 375 375 (0, 0, 255, 255)

PAUSE 1000

#Outline an hour glass shape
OUTLINE_POLYGON 0 0 499 0 0 499 499 499 (255, 255, 0, 255)

PAUSE 1000

#Draw a bunch of float lines
LINE_FLOAT 125 0 374 499 (62, 193, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 128 0 371 499 (64, 191, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 131 0 368 499 (65, 190, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 134 0 365 499 (67, 188, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 137 0 362 499 (68, 187, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 140 0 359 499 (70, 185, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 143 0 356 499 (71, 184, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 146 0 353 499 (73, 182, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 149 0 350 499 (74, 181, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 152 0 347 499 (76, 179, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 155 0 344 499 (77, 178, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 158 0 341 499 (79, 176, 0, 255)

LINE_FLOAT 272 0 227 499 (136, 119, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 275 0 224 499 (137, 118, 0, 255)

LINE_FLOAT 281 0 218 499 (140, 115, 0, 255)

LINE_FLOAT 317 0 182 499 (158, 97, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 320 0 179 499 (160, 95, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 323 0 176 499 (161, 94, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 326 0 173 499 (163, 92, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 329 0 170 499 (164, 91, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 332 0 167 499 (166, 89, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 335 0 164 499 (167, 88, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 338 0 161 499 (169, 86, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 341 0 158 499 (170, 85, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 344 0 155 499 (172, 83, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 347 0 152 499 (173, 82, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 350 0 149 499 (175, 80, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 353 0 146 499 (176, 79, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 356 0 143 499 (178, 77, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 359 0 140 499 (179, 76, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 362 0 137 499 (181, 74, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 365 0 134 499 (182, 73, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 368 0 131 499 (184, 71, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 371 0 128 499 (185, 70, 0, 255)
LINE_FLOAT 374 0 125 499 (187, 68, 0, 255)

PAUSE 1000

#Draw a bunch of other lines
LINE 0 125 499 374 (0, 62, 193, 255)
LINE 0 128 499 371 (0, 64, 191, 255)
LINE 0 131 499 368 (0, 65, 190, 255)
LINE 0 134 499 365 (0, 67, 188, 255)

LINE 0 296 499 203 (0, 148, 107, 255)

LINE 0 308 499 191 (0, 154, 101, 255)
LINE 0 311 499 188 (0, 155, 100, 255)
LINE 0 314 499 185 (0, 157, 98, 255)
LINE 0 317 499 182 (0, 158, 97, 255)
LINE 0 320 499 179 (0, 160, 95, 255)
LINE 0 323 499 176 (0, 161, 94, 255)
LINE 0 326 499 173 (0, 163, 92, 255)
LINE 0 329 499 170 (0, 164, 91, 255)
LINE 0 332 499 167 (0, 166, 89, 255)
LINE 0 335 499 164 (0, 167, 88, 255)
LINE 0 338 499 161 (0, 169, 86, 255)
LINE 0 341 499 158 (0, 170, 85, 255)
LINE 0 344 499 155 (0, 172, 83, 255)
LINE 0 347 499 152 (0, 173, 82, 255)
LINE 0 350 499 149 (0, 175, 80, 255)
LINE 0 353 499 146 (0, 176, 79, 255)
LINE 0 356 499 143 (0, 178, 77, 255)
LINE 0 359 499 140 (0, 179, 76, 255)
LINE 0 362 499 137 (0, 181, 74, 255)
LINE 0 365 499 134 (0, 182, 73, 255)
LINE 0 368 499 131 (0, 184, 71, 255)
LINE 0 371 499 128 (0, 185, 70, 255)
LINE 0 374 499 125 (0, 187, 68, 255)
PAUSE 1000

#Crop to the center
CROP 400 400

PAUSE 1000

#Fill some overlapping circles
FILL_CIRCLE 200 300 150 (255,0,0,128)

FILL_CIRCLE 300 300 150 (0,0,255,128)

FILL_CIRCLE 250 200 150 (0, 255, 0,128)

# Outline the circles
OUTLINE_CIRCLE 200 300 150 (0,255,0,128)

OUTLINE_CIRCLE 300 300 150 (255,0,0,128)

OUTLINE_CIRCLE 250 200 150 (0, 0, 255,128)

PAUSE 1000

# draw a polygon with two pairs of adjacent vertical lines
FILL_POLYGON 50 100 51 100 51 125 99 125 99 100 100 100 100 200 99 200 99 175 51 175 51 200 40 200 50 185 (255, 0, 255, 255)

PAUSE 1000

#Fill a polygon with criss crossing lines
FILL_POLYGON 0 0 100 100 200 0 300 100 400 0 400 100 300 0 200 100 100 0 0 100 (255, 255, 255, 100)

PAUSE 1000

#Fill an out of bounds V shape polygon
FILL_POLYGON -20 200 250 400 520 200 520 250 250 450 -20 250 (96, 206, 135, 178)

PAUSE 1000

#Load the "hunter.png" file included with these files and display it to the buffer
LOAD_PNG TestFiles/hunter.png

SAVE test0x.bmp
